game.name: LuGame: Lunchtime Games Club!
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, Steam 도전 과제, Steam 트레이딩 카드, 컨트롤러 일부 지원, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: A games club’s without members… or games?! Who is this crazy robot girl? Why am I being harassed by this cute bully? Life may not have a controller, but it certainly feels like a big game!
game.shortDescriptionEn: A games club’s without members… or games?! Who is this crazy robot girl? Why am I being harassed by this cute bully? Life may not have a controller, but it certainly feels like a big game!

reviewHighlights.text: 왜 건전한 게임에 누드, 선정적인 내용, 성인 태그를 넣었어요? 왜 케릭터들은 꼴리게 생겼는데 왜 키스도 안하나요?? 난 더 자극적인걸 원하는데... 그래도 태닝 빗치 보추 케릭이라도 있으니 따봉드립니다
